scripts.text:
WITH ResenasPorSemana AS (
    SELECT 
        l.place_id,
        DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)) AS semana,
        COUNT(*) AS num_resenas_semana,
        count(review) as num_comentarios,
        count(response) as num_respuestas,        
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '5.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_5,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '4.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_4,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '3.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_3,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '2.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_2,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '1.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_1
    FROM MAESTROS.LINK_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS l 
    JOIN MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEW_TEXTOS s 
        ON s.hash_key_review_place = l.hash_key_review_place 
        AND s.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR = 'S'
    GROUP BY 
        l.place_id,
        DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review) ) 
),
RankedResenasPorSemana AS (
    SELECT *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY num_resenas_semana DESC) AS Rank
    FROM ResenasPorSemana
), ResenasPorPlace as (
SELECT
    r.place_id,    
    MIN(r.semana) AS desde,
    MAX(r.semana) AS hasta,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, DATEDIFF(week, MIN(r.semana), MAX(r.semana)) ) AS semanas_historia,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, COUNT(DISTINCT r.semana) ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE WHEN r.num_resenas_5 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)  ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_5,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE WHEN r.num_resenas_1 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_1,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(r.num_resenas_semana) ) AS num_resenas,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(r.num_comentarios)) AS comentarios,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT, SUM(r.num_respuestas) ) AS num_respuestas,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_5) ) AS num_resenas_5,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_4)) AS num_resenas_4,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_3)) AS num_resenas_3,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_2)) AS num_resenas_2,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_1)) AS num_resenas_1,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_semana ELSE 0 END)) AS TotalResenasEnSemanaMasResenas,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_5 ELSE 0 END) ) AS Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_1 ELSE 0 END) )  AS Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas,
    -- Calcular el número de semanas con reseñas en el último año
    TRY_CONVERT(float, SUM(CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(month, r.semana, GETDATE()) < 12 THEN 1
        ELSE 0 
    END)) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(month, r.semana, GETDATE()) < 12 THEN r.num_resenas_semana
        ELSE 0 
    END)) AS num_resenas_ultimo_12_meses
FROM RankedResenasPorSemana r
GROUP BY r.place_id )
SELECT 
	place_id,
    desde,
    hasta, 
    semanas_historia,
    num_semanas_con_resenas semanas_con_resenas,
    num_resenas, 
    case 
    when semanas_historia > 52 then num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/52 
    when semanas_historia > 0 then num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/semanas_historia 
    else 0 end  ratio_semanas_con_resenas_ult_12m,
    case when num_resenas >0 then num_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/num_resenas else 0 end  ratio_resenas_ult_12m,
    case when num_resenas >0 then comentarios/num_resenas else 0 end  ratio_resenas_comentadas,
    case when comentarios >0 then num_respuestas/comentarios else 0 end  ratio_resenas_respondidas,
    TotalResenasEnSemanaMasResenas max_rese_semana,
    case when num_resenas >9 then (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) /num_resenas else 0 end ratio_manipulacion,
    case when num_resenas >9 and (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) >0 then Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas/(Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) else 0 end ratio_manipulacion_positiva,
    case when num_resenas >9 and (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) >0 then Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas/(Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) else 0 end ratio_manipulacion_negativa,
    num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1 popularidad_teorica,
    (num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) popularidad_real,
    case when num_resenas>0 then (num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1)/num_resenas else 0 end ranking_teorico,
    case 
	    when num_resenas>9 then ((num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas))/num_resenas
	    when  num_resenas>0 then (num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1)/num_resenas
	    else 0 end ranking_real,    
	(num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3-num_resenas_2*2-(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas)*5 as satisfaccion_clientes_real
	into calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review_new
	FROM ResenasPorPlace;
drop table calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review;


EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review_new', N'datos_place_manipulacion_review', 'OBJECT';



SELECT place_id,
    DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)) AS semana , count(*) num_resenas_semana,
    sum(case s.rating when '5.0' then 1 else 0 end) num_resenas_5,
    sum(case s.rating when '1.0' then 1 else 0 end) num_resenas_1    
into calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas_new
    FROM
    MAESTROS.LINK_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS l 
join MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEW_TEXTOS s on s.hash_key_review_place = l.hash_key_review_place and s.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR ='S' 
   group by DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), place_id

 

  
drop table calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas;

 EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas_new', N'datos_evolucion_resenas', 'OBJECT';

CREATE TABLE farma.calculos.datos_farmacias_2 (
	hash_codigo_centro nvarchar(64) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
	nombre_oficial nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	fecha_primera_apertura date NULL,
	fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo date NULL,
	direccion_oficial nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	direccion_normalizada nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	precision_normalización float NULL,
	precision_busqueda_place float NULL,
	latitud float NULL,
	longitud float NULL,
	horario nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	estado nvarchar(100) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	place_id nvarchar(150) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	nombre_google nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	afluencia nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	ratio_valoracion nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	comentarios_por_ratio nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	link_centro nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	informacion_servicios nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	Servicios_centro nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	geo_coordenadas geography NULL
	);

--TRUNCATE TABLE calculos.datos_farmacias_2;



SELECT
COALESCE (s2.cod_bbdd, concat('sin_bbdd_', p.place_id)) cod_bbdd,
COALESCE (l.hash_codigo_centro, concat('sin_hash_centro_', p.place_id)) hash_codigo_centro,
COALESCE (s2.nombre_cod_bbdd , p.name) nombre_oficial,
p.place_id ,
COALESCE (s2.dir_normalizada_cod_farma, p.full_address) direccion_oficial,
TRY_CONVERT(date, fecha_autorizacion_funcionamiento) AS   fecha_primera_apertura,
TRY_CONVERT(date, fecha_ultima_autorizacion) AS  fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo,
p.full_address  direccion_normalizada,
s2.semejanza_dir_place precision_normalización
,(try_convert(float,s2.semejanza_dir_place) +try_convert(float,s2.semejanza_cp_place))/2  precision_busqueda_place,
TRY_CONVERT(float,p.latitude) latitud,
TRY_CONVERT(float,p.longitude) longitud,
p.working_hours horario,
p.business_status estado,
p.name  nombre_google,
p.popular_times afluencia,
p.rating ratio_valoracion,
p.reviews_per_score comentarios_por_ratio,
p.street_view link_centro,
p.about informacion_servicios
,ser_cen.Servicios_centro
--count(*) , count(DISTINCT p.place_id) , count( DISTINCT COALESCE(p.place_id, s2.cod_bbdd  , l.hash_codigo_centro  ) )
into calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias
FROM farma.MAESTROS.pip_sat_place p
left  JOIN 
    (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY semejanza_dir_place DESC) as rn 
     FROM calculos.ranking_direcciones_normalizadas) as l ON l.place_id = p.place_id AND l.rn = 1
left JOIN 
    (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY semejanza_dir_place DESC) as rn 
     FROM farma.MAESTROS.sat_similitud_direcciones_cod_bbdd) as s2 ON s2.place_id = p.place_id AND s2.rn = 1
left join 
     MAESTROS.SAT_CENTRO_FECHAS_ADMIN s4 on s4.hash_codigo_centro= l.hash_codigo_centro and s4.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR ='S'
left join MAESTROS.referencia_ubicaciones_multicentros ser_cen on ser_cen.address_label= s2.dir_normalizada_cod_farma
where     "type" IN('Pharmacy', 'Farmacia')  and TRY_CONVERT(float,p.latitude) is not null and TRY_CONVERT(float,p.longitude) is not null




insert into calculos.datos_farmacias_2 (hash_codigo_centro, nombre_oficial, fecha_primera_apertura, fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo, direccion_oficial, direccion_normalizada, precision_normalización, precision_busqueda_place, latitud, longitud, horario, estado,place_id, nombre_google, afluencia, ratio_valoracion, comentarios_por_ratio, link_centro, informacion_servicios, Servicios_centro, geo_coordenadas)
SELECT 
hash_codigo_centro, nombre_oficial, fecha_primera_apertura, fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo, 
direccion_oficial, direccion_normalizada, precision_normalización, precision_busqueda_place,
latitud, longitud, horario, estado,place_id, nombre_google, afluencia, ratio_valoracion,
comentarios_por_ratio, link_centro, informacion_servicios, Servicios_centro
,geography::Point(latitud, longitud, 4326) AS geo_coordenadas
--into calculos.datos_farmacias_2
FROM calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias p
JOIN (select DISTINCT golden_record from  MAESTROS.LINK_DUPLICADOS_PLACE_FARMACIAS L 
join MAESTROS.SAT_DUPLICADOS_PLACE_FARMACIAS S ON S.key_link_deduplicados_farmas= L.key_link_deduplicados_farmas
WHERE  proba_duplicado >0.55) DUP ON DUP.golden_record= p.place_id
WHERE 
    p.latitud IS NOT NULL AND p.longitud IS NOT NULL
    AND p.latitud BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND p.longitud BETWEEN -180 AND 180
;
EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_farmacias', N'datos_farmacias_old', 'OBJECT';
EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_farmacias_2', N'datos_farmacias', 'OBJECT';

drop table calculos.datos_farmacias_old;
drop table calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias;


WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY hash_codigo_centro  ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn
    FROM calculos.datos_farmacias
)
DELETE FROM CTE WHERE rn > 1;


ALTER TABLE calculos.datos_farmacias ADD CONSTRAINT PK_hash_codigo_centro PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (hash_codigo_centro);
CREATE SPATIAL INDEX idx_geoespacial_datos_farmacia ON calculos.datos_farmacias(geo_coordenadas);
